food.name: Tea
food.description: Tea is an aromatic beverage commonly prepared by pouring hot or boiling water over cured leaves of the Camellia sinensis

food.name: Coffee
food.description: Coffee is a brewed drink prepared from roasted coffee beans, which are the seeds of berries from the Coffea plant
